objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Manual Controls
• Full HD Video Recording
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
This banner is a visually bold promotional layout designed to advertise a professional camera. It is divided into four quadrants with a dark-themed modern aesthetic and a vivid red accent that adds energy and urgency. The top-left quadrant prominently displays the brand name (`brand_name`) and model (`product_model`) in contrasting white to establish brand recognition. Beneath them, a promotional headline (`heading`) catches the viewer’s eye in red, followed by a supporting offer (`offer`) in white. A detailed list of features (`features`) outlines selling points, aligned vertically. Pricing (`price`) is emphasized in large white text, followed by a unifying tagline (`tagline`). A red call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg`) with white “SHOP NOW” text (`cta`) adds urgency. The right half showcases a high-resolution camera image (`product_image`) with subtle design accents, enhancing product focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1E1E1E`
- Dark Gray: `#2A2A2A`, `#262626`, `#333333`
- Bright Red: `#E74C3C`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek, modern look with a predominantly matte black body (#1A1A1A) paired with metallic accents that reflect light elegantly. It uses a refined mix of deep blacks and subtle grays (#2C2C2C, #4D4D4D) to convey sophistication and precision, essential traits for advertisement. The lens features slight silver linings and soft reflections, while glass surfaces highlight hints of subtle green (#A2C1A5), yellow (#F1D96A), and mild blue (#8FB5CE) that blend naturally through reflections, drawing the viewer’s attention. White text (#FFFFFF) on the black frame contrasts sharply and authoritatively, making the product’s branding prominent and easily recognizable.
